entry.title: Thursday night: Blowing snow. Low minus 31.
entry.summary: Clearing early this evening. Blowing snow. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 31. Wind chill near minus 44. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High minus 23.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness late in the afternoon. Wind west 20 km/h. High minus 23. Wind chill minus 44 in the morning and minus 34 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 22. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries late in the evening and overnight. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near minus 22. Wind chill near minus 34. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 12 January 2023
